archimate:Requirement.name: TM.1.3.13b: b) recording all information about the incident, including corrective actions taken, for a comprehensive post-incident report to both internal stakeholders and external bodies (e.g. regulators, law enforcement or other government agencies)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
